thread.title: For $150,000, you can ride choppers with Keanu
thread.title_full: For $150,000, you can ride choppers with Keanu - CNN.com

author: Brandon Griggs
title: For $150,000, you can ride choppers with Keanu
text:
Story highlights High-end retailer Neiman Marcus offers "fantasy gifts" in its annual Christmas Book Among them: A two-day, $150,000 motorcycle ride with actor Keanu Reeves (CNN) Do you have a need for Speed? Want to take an Excellent Adventure?
For a mere $150,000, you and a companion can join actor Keanu Reeves in California for a two-day motorcycle ride along the Pacific Coast and through the Santa Monica Mountains.
You'll share meals together, talk motorcycle design -- or maybe Zen Buddhism, or Sandra Bullock -- and cap the trip with a nice parting gift: a custom-built KRGT-1 bike from the Arch Motorcycle Company , which Reeves co-owns.
It's just one of the over-the-top "fantasy gifts" being offered by high-end retailer Neiman Marcus in their annual Christmas Book , a holiday gift catalog for people who already have everything.
If biking with Keanu isn't your thing, you could spring for a luxury trip to space ($90,000), a collection of rare craft bourbons ($125,000), Lyle Lovett's handmade guitar ($30,000) or a dream trip across India ($400,000).
Read More They're all just a little more exciting than that gift card from Banana Republic.
Sure, these gifts are pricey, but you can sink into profound debt knowing that a percentage of your purchase will benefit the Heart of Neiman Marcus Foundation , which supports arts education for children.
